author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-590 - Add a new scription variable "properties" which points by default to resource.adaptTo(ValueMap.class). The name of the variable can be overwritten as well as the class for the adaptTo can be changed to Map.

author: jvazquez
msg: Implemented three kind of xml generation: dynamic generation based on a script, static with adaptTo(InputStream) and fallback to export document view

author: nbubna
msg: VELOCITY-704 turn #stop into a true directive that accepts a Scope as an optional argument identifying exactly what to stop, but still stops everything if no argument is given
